name: atr-blocks/atr-inline-rtl-ltr
title: Atr Inline Rtl Ltr
description:
A handy tool for mixed Rtl Ltr writing directions. Wrap words (or sentences) in paragraph block with span element and change their direction from rtl to ltr and vice versa. Uses dir='rtl' or dir='ltr' See also https://www.w3.org/International/articles/inline-bidi-markup/.
Note that the wrapping element is so you can control it through your site CSS as well. I.E. .atr-inline-direction-rtl{direction: rtl;display:inline-block}
